zapata.data module¶

Data retrieve and resampling module¶

zapata.data.read_xarray(dataset=None, var=None, period=None, level=None, season=None, region=None, verbose=False)[source]¶

Load into a DataArray the requested variable from dataset source.

Parameters

  • dataset (string) – Name of dataset

  • var (string) – variable name

  • period (list) – A two element list with initial and final years

  • level (float) – level value (if not in levels list the closest one will be used)

  • season (string) – Month (‘JAN’), season (‘DJF’, ‘AMJ’) or annual (‘ANN’)

  • region (list) – Region corners [LonMax, LonMin, LatMax, LatMin]

  • verbose (Boolean) – True/False – Tons of Output

Returns

out – extracted data

Return type

DataArray

Examples

>>> da = read_xarray(dataset='ERA5_MM',var='T',period=[2000 2010], level='500')
>>> da = read_xarray(dataset='C-GLORSv7', var='votemper', period=[2000 2010], season='DJF')
zapata.data.da_time_mean(da, sample)[source]¶

Sample datarray based on month/season and compute average over timewindows

Parameters

  • da (DataArray) – Input data

  • sample (string) – Identifier of temporal sampling (e.g., JAN, FEB, …, ANN, DJF, MAM …)

Returns

out – Time sampled DataArrray

Return type

DataArray

Examples

>>> da = da_time_mean(da, 'JJA')
>>> da = da_time_mean(da, 'ANN')
zapata.data.subyear_weights(time, freq)[source]¶

Compute month weights according to frequency anchored offsets (season/year)

Parameters

  • time (DataArray) – Time array of input data

  • freq (string) – Identifier of pandas temporal anchored offsets (e.g., A, Q-DEC)

Returns

weights – weights to be applied at data before subyear time averaging

Return type

DataArray

zapata.data.load_dataarray(dataset, var, level, period)[source]¶

Read requested data into an xarray DataArray using dataset driver

Parameters

  • dataset (dict) – Dataset informative structure

  • var (string) – variable name

  • level (list) – vertical levels float value

  • period (list) – Might be None or a two element list with initial and final year

Returns

out – Output data from dataset

Return type

DataArray

zapata.data.roll_long(da)[source]¶

Roll longitude coordinate between 0..360. Note that longitude dimension name must be ‘lon’.

Parameters

da (dataArray) – Xarray data structure

Returns

da – Xarray data structure

Return type

dataArray

zapata.data.mask_data(da, mask_name, mask_file, coord_map)[source]¶

Mask dataarray using a [0-1] mask file and the following convention, 0:remove, 1:retain

Parameters

  • dataset (dict) – Dataset informative structure

  • mask_name (string) – mask variable name

  • mask_file (string) – input file full path where mask variable is contained

  • coord_map (dict) – Dictionary to rename dimensions

Returns

da – Xarray data structure with rename features

Return type

dataArray

zapata.data.fix_coords(da, coord_map)[source]¶

Rename dimensions and coordinates to common names using mapping provided in dataset definition

Parameters

  • da (dataArray) – Xarray data structure

  • coord_map (dict) – Dictionary to rename coordinate and dimensions

Returns

da – Xarray data structure with rename features

Return type

dataArray

zapata.data.get_data_files(dataset, var, level, period)[source]¶

Retrieve list of input files for requested dataset/variable pair.

Parameters

  • dataset (dict) – Dataset informative structure

  • var (string) – variable name

  • level (float) – vertical levels float value

  • period (list) – Might be None or a two element list with initial and final year

Returns

files – Dataset input files, variable name, requested period

Return type

dict

zapata.data.dataset_request_var(dataset, var, level, period)[source]¶

Perform consistency control on user dataset requests and find matching variable.

Parameters

  • dataset (dict) – Dataset informative structure

  • var (string) – variable name

  • level (list) – vertical levels float value

  • period (list) – Might be None or a two element list with initial and final year

Returns

var_info – requested variable information: [component, data stream, type]

Return type

list

zapata.data.inquire_catalogue(dataset=None, info=False)[source]¶

Retrieve requested dataset informative structure from general catalogue (YAML file).

If no dataset is requested, print a list of available datasets name and description.

If info is True print additional details without loading dataset if provided

Parameters

  • dataset (string) – Name of data set

  • info (boolean) – Print additional details for all or selected dataset

Returns

out – requested dataset informative structure

Return type

dict

Examples

>>> datacat = inquire_catalogue(dataset='C-GLORSv7')
>>> inquire_catalogue()
    List of datasets in catalogue:
    C-GLORSv7 : Ocean Global Reanalyses at 1/4° resolution monthly means
    ERA5_MM : ERA5 Monthly Mean on Pressure Levels
>>> inquire_catalogue(dataset='ERA5_MM', info=True)
    Access dataset ERA5_MM
    atm component [IFS]
     Data Stream monthly 3D variables:
     - U : Zonal Wind
     - V : Meridional Wind
     - W : Vertical Velocity
     ...
